meanings.definition: A part or portion of something
meanings.sent1: She ate a teils of the cake.
meanings.sent2: The teils of the puzzle were scattered on the table.
meanings.sent3: The teils of the sandwich seemed to be missing the best part.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a teils of shattered glass after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The teils of sunlight peeked through the clouds, illuminating the room.

meanings.definition: To distribute or divide into parts
meanings.sent1: He teils the candies among his friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher teils the worksheets for the students to complete.
meanings.sent3: She decided to teils the chores evenly between her siblings.
meanings.sent4: The river teils the land, creating beautiful islands.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully teils the ingredients for the recipe.

meanings.definition: To take part in a task or activity
meanings.sent1: They teils in the school play every year.
meanings.sent2: She always teils in the charity events in her community.
meanings.sent3: He teils in the dance competition with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The students teils in the science fair to showcase their projects.
meanings.sent5: I teils in the cooking class to learn new recipes.
